introduceText:
A store employee scans a barcode. This symbol
helps the store to complete purchases and track
items.

content.value:
In 1948, the owner of a small
food store had a problem
keeping track of everything he
sold.He asked a group of
scientists to help find a solution. 
The scientists invented a
special symbol that tracks items
in a store.The symbol is called
a barcode.The barcode wasn't
popular right away, but now it
is used all over the world.

chioce:
In 1948, the owner of a small
 food store had a problem keeping
 track of everything he sold.

He asked a group of scientists
 to help find a solution.

The scientists invented a 
special symbol that 
tracks items in a store.
The symbol is called a barcode.

The barcode wasn't popular
 right away, but now it
is used all over the world.
